name: Deep Beneath
description:
You must help a school of fish migrate to the other side while avoiding predators, you control all fish on screen at once. The school will try to stay together but you may also leave fish behind.

There is 13 fish scattered across this part of the ocean, you only need one to win but can you save all?

This was a short experiment project for the Ludum Dare #29 jam (theme "Beneath the Surface") inspired by Boids and Limbo.

Controls: WASD 
Fullscreen: Alt+Enter
